gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 99, Grizzlies 92
gameRecap.excerpt: Dejounte Murray led the Hawks with a career-high tying 41 points, along with seven rebounds, and six assists as Bogdan Bogdanovic added 16 points and six rebounds for the Hawks, who defeated the Grizzlies, 99-92. Jaren Jackson Jr. led Memphis with 21 points, nine rebounds, and three assists.
